lighting_and_atmosphere.time_of_day: Late Golden Hour / Sunset (Sun low on horizon, visible sunburst)

lighting_and_atmosphere.shadow_style: Long dramatic directional shadows, Deep cool ambient shadows (blue/grey) contrasting with bright warm highlights

architectural_lighting.interior_illumination: Minimal interior lighting (overpowered by sunlight), Faint hints of warm interior depth in shadowed facades, Non-competitive with natural light
architectural_lighting.exterior_facade_effects: Specular highlights from sunset reflection on glass curtain walls, 'Golden Rim' lighting on building edges, Anisotropic reflections on metal louvers

landscape_lighting.hardscape_illumination: Natural grazing light emphasizing asphalt texture, Long shadows cast by curbs and street furniture, No artificial streetlights active yet
landscape_lighting.vegetation_highlighting: Translucent backlighting through tree canopies (Subsurface scattering in leaves), Trees casting long distinct shadows across the road
landscape_lighting.water_feature_effects: N/A (or Highly reflective surface mirroring the burning sun if present)
